Name: Cartethyia's Pendant
AttributesDescription: A pendant once worn close to Cartethyia's heart. It seems she left a message within. Since her frequency still lingers within you, resonating with the pendant may reveal her message.
BgDescription: {PlayerName}, trust her. And trust me... Everything we've done... is to... defeat... Leviathan...
ObtainedShowDescription: A pendant once worn close to Cartethyia's heart. It has somehow ended up in the hands of the Discord Slayerâ€¦
